ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا وَرَضُوا۟ بِٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱطْمَأَنُّوا۟ بِهَا وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنْ ءَايَٰتِنَا غَٰفِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who do not expect to meet Us and are content with the life of the dunya and at rest in it, and those who are heedless of Our Signs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As for those who do not hope to meet Us (after death), and are content with the life of this world, who are oblivious of Our signs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely those who do not expect to meet Us, who are gratified with the life of the world and content with it, and are heedless of Our signs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who do not have hope of receiving Our mercy in the life hereafter who are pleased and satisfied with the worldly life and who pay no attention to Our revelations
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those who do not expect to meet Us and have preferred the worldly life and are content with it, and those who neglect Our signs, –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who hope not for their meeting with Us, but are pleased and satisfied with the life of the present world, and those who are heedless of Our Ayat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely those who do not hope in Our meeting and are pleased with this world's life and are content with it, and those who are heedless of Our communications:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely those who look not to encounter Us and are well-pleased with the present life and are at rest in it, and those who are heedless of Our signs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those who expect not the meeting with Us but desire the life of the world and feel secure therein, and those who are neglectful of Our revelations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who entertain no hope of meeting Us, being pleased and contented with the life of this world, and those who give no heed to Our signs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those who hope not for meeting with us, and, well- pleased with the life of the world, and are satisfied therewith, and those who are neglectful of our signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those who do not expect to encounter Us and who are pleased with the life of this world and satisfied with it, and those who are oblivious of Our signs
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who rest not their hope on their meeting with Us, but are pleased and satisfied with the life of the present, and those who heed not Our Signs,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, those who hope not for their meeting with Us, but are pleased and satisfied with the life of the present world, and those who are heedless of Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who do not expect to meet Us, and are wellpleased with this life and are satisfied with it, and those who are inattentive to Our signs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who do not hope to meet Us, and are content with the worldly life, and are at ease in it, and those who pay no heed to Our signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, those who do not expect the meeting with Us and are satisfied with the life of this world and feel secure therein and those who are heedless of Our signs
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:7] Truly those who do not expect to encounter Us, through resurrection, and are content with the life of this world, instead of [the life] the Hereafter, since they reject [the truth of] it, and feel reassured, feel secure, in it, and those who are heedless of Our signs, [of] the proofs of Our Oneness, neglecting to ponder them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! those who expect not) those who fear not (the meeting with Us) through resurrection after death; it is also said that this means: those who do not believe in resurrection after death (but desire the life of the world) but choose instead what is in the life of this world over the Hereafter (and feel secure therein) and are pleased with this life, (and those who are neglectful) deniers (of Our revelations) Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an,
